Action.author: derashe
Action.body: Sean|https://jira.hyperledger.org/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=SeanBohan_Sovrin , sorry, I have probably misinformed you. This issue is only about plenum code base and it influence only on plenum tests. The node's DomainRequestHandler is working ok.

Action.author: krw910
Action.body: ~Derashe So what needs to happen with this ticket?

Action.author: derashe
Action.body: Kelly Wilson|https://jira.hyperledger.org/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=krw910 Well, in plenum code, particulary in plenum tests, we have wrong behaviour of DomainRequestHandler. For example, at this moment nym transaction in plenum tests can be performed only by steward. Trustee cannot do that. This task is about to change the code in plenum's DomainRequestHandler in such a way that it will satisfy Sovrin network roles file.

Action.author: ashcherbakov
Action.body: We don't use Plenum outside Node for now
